metadata.title: CVE-2024-39614 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
get_supported_language_variant() was subject to a potentialdenial-of-service attack when used with very long strings including aspecific set of characters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-39614` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.12
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.2.12-2ubuntu1.12').
